name: qdrant-hackathon-backend
description: Backend API for music video processing with AI-powered recommendations using Qdrant vector database

scripts.init-qdrant: python -c "from app.services.data_service import DataService; from app.services.qdrant_service import QdrantService; from config.config import DevelopmentConfig; qs = QdrantService(DevelopmentConfig.QDRANT_HOST, DevelopmentConfig.QDRANT_PORT); ds = DataService(qs); ds.initialize_data()"

author: Your Name
